name: Net lugg lo!
description:
This game was created as a weekly university task in this lecture

In this game, the player needs to defuse a bomb by following instructions of a bomb specialist he is connected with over the phone, the catch being that the bomb specialist is from Austria and more specifically Vorarlberg (one of Austria’s most distinct dialects).

The game combines classical story telling elements, as in text prologue and epilogue, with voice lines that, in part, change depending on the player’s actions. This work is largely influenced by I WANT TO DIE SCREAMING UNCLEAR by Chang and Voge 2020. Main goal in this project was to perpetuate chaos and panic. This is achieved with both music and obviously also dialect. Additionally the bomb design is purposefully confusingly simple and weird.
